articles.author: George Lee
articles.title: New Johnson and Johnson advice expected next week - RTE.ie
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency is expected to announce new advice about the use of the single-shot Covid-19 vaccine manufactured by Johnson and Johnson's subsidiary Janssen on Thursday next week.
articles.content:
The European Medicines Agency is expected to announce new advice about the use of the single-shot Covid-19 vaccine manufactured by Johnson and Johnson's subsidiary Janssen on Thursday next week.

articles.title: Dye-based device sees the invisible, Business News - AsiaOne
articles.description: Tsukuba, Japan, Apr 16, 2021 - (ACN Newswire) - Scientists in Europe have designed an organic dye-based device that can see light waves in the shortwave infrared (SWIR) range. The device is easy to make using cheap materials, and is stable at high temperature…
